title: Always use a specific SIM Card for contacts from specific Google Account
content:
I am the proud owner of a Pixel 5 now. I am using the Double SIM function as well. So I was wondering if there was a way to set my phone app to always use one specific SIM Card if I want to call a contact from one specific Google Account.

For example: I set SIM Card "1" for my "Business" Google Account and "2" for my "Private" Account. If I call Lily, who is saved into my Business Account, the app automatically uses SIM Card "1". If I call Boris instead, who is saved to my Private Account, the app automatically uses SIM Card "2".

Is there some way to realize this? I couldn't find anything.
